text: Vincent Francis Guzzo, Jr. (August 4, 1939 - September 28, 2015), better known by his stage name Frankie Ford, was an American singer. He was best known for his 1959 hit "Sea Cruise". His main genres were rock and roll, rhythm and blues and pop. Ford was born in Gretna, Louisiana. He was adopted by Vincent and Anna Guzzo. Ford died from natural causes after a long illness on September 28, 2015 in New Orleans, Louisiana. He was 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American adoptees Category:American R&B; singers Category:American rock singers Category:American pop singers Category:Singers from Louisiana
title: Frankie Ford
